payments.title: Credit in XEX
payments.description: Upload any amount of XEX to pay for services. Get instant refunds for unused credit

functions.name: purchase_tru
functions.function: Purchase TruCode allowance to publish a TruCode on EX Blockchain. Requires balance with this TruCode first.

functions.name: purchase_mb
functions.function: To purchase 1MB of space for a TruCode on the Blockchain. Requires balance with this TruCode first.
inputHelp: Nonce - the transaction serial number that resulted in the formation of the TruCode

functions.name: purchase_oracle
functions.function: To purchase Oracle credits. Requires balance with this TruCode first.

functions.name: purchase_oracleTru
functions.function: To purchase Oracle credits for your TruCode. Requires balance with this TruCode first.
inputHelp: Nonce - the transaction serial number that resulted in the formation of the TruCode

functions.name: getTruPrice
functions.function: Check the price of issuing a TruCode on EX Blockchain

functions.name: getMBPrice
functions.function: Check the price of 1MB space on EX Blockchain

functions.name: getOraclePrice
functions.function: Check the price of an Oracle credit
